item.title: Can I know time of clean this mess ? As at 2pm nothing done! Same problem!, 10th October
item.description:
Same when has been reported.... Mistake or lie ???!!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Next door neighbours rubbish is out of control, 10th October
item.description:
My next door neighbours rubbish is out of control as you can see in photo provided. It’s now getting to the point, because their bins are never collected they are now starting to put their rubbish in my bins not even in bags. Which is then having a knock on effect as my bins won’t be collected. This is a public pathway, I have children and it is becoming a hazard and very unhygienic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bostall Hill, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and overflowing bins, 10th October
item.description:
Bramcote Park is overflowing with rubbish strewn all around the park, piles of dog poo bags and the bins have not been empties for at least several weeks. In the dog park, there are large plastic bags dumped. The playground area on the opposite side of the road appears to have its bins emptied regularly, but Bramcote Park is looking like a landfill with dangerous sanitation problems for the local community. Please help us out!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Varcoe Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chippenham Mews, Maida Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Redundant posts blocking pavement, 10th October
item.description:
Used to be a street name sign but posts have not been in use for over ten years. In combination with the nearby traffic bollards they block prams using the pavement which then have to go into the road all along that stretch of road until there is a drop kerb at the other end. Hopefully remove and reuse somewhere else.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kett Gardens, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
